metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9572 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A NULL pointer dereference flaw was found in the way openjpeg 2.1.2 decodedcertain input images. Due to a logic error in the code responsible fordecoding the input image, an application using openjpeg to process imagedata could crash when processing a crafted image.

criterions.comment: openjpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
